draftForHighBust.d: Draft the pattern for the high bust measurement (if available) rather than the (full) chest. This will result in a more fitted garment for people with breasts.
sleeveEase.d: Amount of ease of your sleeves
sleeveLength.d: Controls the length of your sleeves
necklineBend.d: Controls the curvature of the neckline.
necklineDepth.d: Controls how deep the neck opening plunges down.
necklineWidth.d: Controls the width of the neck opening.
